content: I'll take a closer look at the watch and see if I can find any engravings or markings that might give us a lead. I remember my mom mentioning that my great-great-grandfather was a bit of a world traveler, so it's possible the watch has an interesting history. By the way, I was helping my mom clean out the attic about a month ago when we stumbled upon the trunk the watch was in. Do you think that might be a good place to start looking for more information?
